showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:10}); // {Barret}
“The name of Sephiroth's mother…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:15}); // {Cloud}
“I'll come and talk to you once in a while.
Just stick with it.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:27}); // {Cloud}
“This is an illusion Sephiroth made up.”{PAUSE}“He's trying to confuse us.”{PAUSE}“It'll be all right.
As long as we know it's an illusion,
there's nothing to be afraid of.”{PAUSE}“Come on, let's keep going.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:44}); // {Tifa}
“{Cloud}…
It's just an illusion.”{PAUSE}“Don't worry about it…”
fadeScreen({r:255, g:255, b:255, speed:1, type:11}); // unused=0

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:38}); // {Barret}
“How the hell're we gonna get outta here?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:21}); // {Barret}
“Why Nibelheim!?
Are you high on Mako or something?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:30}); // {Barret}
“That ain't {Cloud}…
The hell is he?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:39}); // {Red XIII}
“Is this illusion going to continue forever?
How do we get out of it?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:22}); // {Red XIII}
“But, how!?
A dream? An illusion?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:31}); // {Red XIII}
“{Cloud}'s not here…
I wonder who…this is?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:41}); // {Yuffie}
“I don't want to be in an illusion.
Let's get back to the real world!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:24}); // {Yuffie}
“But why Nibelheim?
This is freaky, REALLY freaky!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:40}); // {Cait Sith}
“Come on, we have to hurry back
to the real world!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:23}); // {Cait Sith}
“But {Tifa}!
Isn't this an illusion?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:32}); // {Cait Sith}
“{Cloud}, something's strange here.
Who is this guy?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:42}); // {Vincent}
“Now, how can we get out of here?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:25}); // {Vincent}
“Why, is it an illusion?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:34}); // {Vincent}
“That's not {Cloud}.
Who is this man?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:43}); // {Cid}
“Hey, {Cloud}.
Let's get back to the real world, OK?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:26}); // {Cid}
“What the hell?
Why Nibelheim!?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:11}); // Sephiroth
“The Mako smells pretty bad here.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:1}); // Sephiroth
“How does it feel?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:2}); // Sephiroth
“It's your first time back to your hometown
in a long time, right?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:3}); // Sephiroth
“So how does it feel?”{PAUSE}“I wouldn't know because
I don't have a hometown…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:5}); // Sephiroth
“My mother is Jenova.
She died right after she gave birth to me.
My father…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:6}); // Sephiroth
“What does it matter?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:7}); // Sephiroth
“All right, let's go.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:7}); // Sephiroth
“All right, let's go.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:12}); // “Psst…

dialogStrings:
Sephiroth
“It's your first time back to your hometown
in a long time, right?”

Sephiroth
“So how does it feel?”{PAUSE}“I wouldn't know because
I don't have a hometown…”

Sephiroth
“My mother is Jenova.
She died right after she gave birth to me.
My father…”

Sephiroth
“The Mako smells pretty bad here.”

“Psst…
(You keep wandering around here and you'll get
in trouble.)”

“Being on watch is so boring.”
{CHOICE}You want to do what we always do?
{CHOICE}Just sit tight, it's your job, right?

{Cloud}
“I'll come and talk to you once in a while.
Just stick with it.”

“Practice?
Oh, you mean practice my pose.”{PAUSE}“Do members of SOLDIER always have
to worry about what others think?”{PAUSE}“How did it go?”
“I really don't want to be in SOLDIER.”

{Barret}
“Why Nibelheim!?
Are you high on Mako or something?”

{Red XIII}
“But, how!?
A dream? An illusion?”

{Yuffie}
“But why Nibelheim?
This is freaky, REALLY freaky!”

{Cloud}
“This is an illusion Sephiroth made up.”{PAUSE}“He's trying to confuse us.”{PAUSE}“It'll be all right.
As long as we know it's an illusion,
there's nothing to be afraid of.”{PAUSE}“Come on, let's keep going.”

{Red XIII}
“{Cloud}'s not here…
I wonder who…this is?”

{Cait Sith}
“{Cloud}, something's strange here.
Who is this guy?”

{Barret}
“How the hell're we gonna get outta here?”

{Red XIII}
“Is this illusion going to continue forever?
How do we get out of it?”

{Cait Sith}
“Come on, we have to hurry back
to the real world!”

{Yuffie}
“I don't want to be in an illusion.
Let's get back to the real world!”

{Vincent}
“Now, how can we get out of here?”

{Cid}
“Hey, {Cloud}.
Let's get back to the real world, OK?”

{Tifa}
“{Cloud}…
It's just an illusion.”{PAUSE}“Don't worry about it…”
